mapper.select: SELECT c.code, c."name",c.province_code AS provinceCode FROM city c INNER JOIN province p ON c.province_code = p.code WHERE c.province_code = #{provinceCode}
SELECT r."code", r."name",r.city_code AS cityCode,r.province_code AS provinceCode FROM region r INNER JOIN city c ON r.city_code = c.code WHERE c.code = #{cityCode}
SELECT s."code", s."name",s.city_code AS cityCode,s.area_code AS areaCode,s.province_code AS provinceCode FROM street s INNER JOIN region r ON s.area_code = r.code WHERE s.area_code = #{regionCode}
